entry.title: Preprint available for accepted paper
entry.content: Our paper titled Efficient Adaptive Stochastic Collocation Strategies for Advection-Diffusion Problems with Uncertain Inputs is availible as a preprint. This is to appear in the Springer Journal of Scientific Computing.
entry.summary: Our paper titled Efficient Adaptive Stochastic Collocation Strategies for Advection-Diffusion Problems with Uncertain Inputs is availible as a preprint. This is to appear in the Springer Journal of Scientific Computing.
